props.itemTitle: Property on supplied `items` that contains its title
props.itemValue: Property on supplied `items` that contains its value
props.itemChildren: Property on supplied `items` that contains its children
props.itemProps: Props object that will be applied to each item component. `true` will treat the original object as raw props and pass it directly to the component.
props.returnObject: Changes the selection behavior to return the object directly rather than the value specified with **item-value**
